{"id":1297261582,"question_id":3471,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"5Â months","timestamp":1719111036,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"3 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1297261582/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Minimum Average of Smallest and Largest Elements","memory":"25 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    double minimumAverage(vector<int>& nums) {\n        \n        vector<int> averages;\n        int n = nums.size();\n        \n        sort(nums.begin(), nums.end());\n        \n        double min_avg = -1;\n        int front = 0;\n        int back = n-1;\n        \n        for(int i=0; i<n/2; i++){\n            double avg = (float)(nums[front] + nums[back])/2;\n            \n            if(min_avg == -1){\n                min_avg = avg;\n            }\n            else{\n                min_avg = (min_avg>avg)?avg:min_avg;\n            }\n            \n            front ++;\n            back --;\n        }\n        return min_avg;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"minimum-average-of-smallest-and-largest-elements","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
